title: A Redline Has Been Crossed (Ep 1715)
description:
Putin crossed a redline yesterday and there’s growing concern about what’s coming next. In this episode I address the crisis and the latest troubling study about a COVID vaccine. 

News Picks:


Is Putin bluffing with his nuclear threats? 


Here’s the real reason George Soros is speaking out about Ukraine. 

Will Putin use thermobaric bombs?

Ballot signature mismatches in Arizona. 


Four new things we just learned about the Special Counsel investigation. 

Biden’s Supreme Court nominee criticized “excessive” punishment for sex offenders.
